description: Factor level shows no K treatment applied. Basal K fertilizer applied to all plots 1981 onwards (not a treatment), see k_basal_rate

Factor level shows annual K treatment applied. 104 or 105 kgKha-1 except in 1968 and 1974 (156kgK to potatoes) and 1969, 1979, 1980 (none applied, fallow), see k_rate_annual. Basal K fertilizer applied to all plots 1981 onwards (not a treatment), see k_basal_rate
